column2: Introduction
column11: From an interdisciplinary perspective including neuroscience, medicine, humanities and the arts, this conference aims to (1) advance and disseminate scientific knowledge on how specific sleep processes promote memory consolidation| (2) encourage new approaches to the importance of dreams and sleep in science and the arts| (3) benefit society by promoting awareness of good sleep habits and their effects on cognitive well-being.

column2: Introduction and Welcome
column11: From an interdisciplinary perspective including neuroscience, medicine, humanities and the arts, this conference aims to (1) advance and disseminate scientific knowledge on how specific sleep processes promote memory consolidation| (2) encourage new approaches to the importance of dreams and sleep in science and the arts| (3) benefit society by promoting awareness of good sleep habits and their effects on cognitive well-being.
